          <title>
            <string language="fr">Les carburants brûlants polluent les pays voisins et la  terre entière</string>
            <string language="en">Burning fuels pollute nearby countries and the whole Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende Kraftstoffe beschmutzen nahe gelegene 
Länder und die vollständige Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os combustíveis ardentes pollute países 
próximos e a terra inteira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I combustibili burning inquinano ai i paesi 
vicini e la terra intera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα καίγοντας καύσιμα μολύνουν τις κοντινές χώρες και 
ολόκληρη τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los combustibles ardientes contaminan países 
próximos y la tierra entera</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette carte prouve que les carburants brûlants en  Grande-Bretagne peuvent affecter les pays voisins et la qualité de l'air partout sur la Terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This map shows that burning fuels in Britain can affect nearby countries and the quality of the air all over the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pluies acides</string>
            <string language="en">acid rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">air pollution</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Britain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">carburants brûlants</string>
            <string language="en">burning fuels</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">dioxyde de sulfure de soufre</string>
            <string language="en">sulphur dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt, daß brennende Kraftstoffe in 
Großbritannien nahe gelegene Länder und die Qualität der Luft ganz 
über der Masse beeinflussen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra que os combustíveis ardentes em
Grâ Bretanha podem afetar países próximos e a qualidade do ar toda 
sobre a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma indica che i combustibili 
burning in Gran-Bretagna possono interessare ai i paesi vicini e la 
qualità dell'aria dappertutto la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης δείχνει ότι τα καίγοντας καύσιμα στη 
Μεγάλη Βρετανία μπορούν να έχουν επιπτώσεις στις κοντινές χώρες
και την ποιότητα του αέρα σε όλη τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra que los combustibles 
ardientes en Gran Bretaña pueden afectar países próximos y la 
calidad del aire todo sobre la tierra.</string>
          </description>
